channel.title: vulkan on Stigatle.no
channel.description: Recent content in vulkan on Stigatle.no

item.title: Learning vulkan.
item.description: I’ve been thinking about it for a long time, what should I focus on next.. I like to choose something then go for it, spend a lot of time with it until I know how it works and can use it for the things I want to do. I’ve been working with Ogre3D for the last 7 years, and now I feel the need to dive a bit deeper into real-time graphics, I never really spent time learning Direct-x or OpenGL, so after giving it some thought I decided to spend time with vulkaninstead.
